entities.name: house-elves
entities.description: The text describes house-elves as proud. They are mentioned alongside other forbidden items.

entities.name: books
entities.description: Thousands of books are mentioned in the text, described as banned or graffitied or stolen.

entities.name: winged catapults
entities.description: Winged catapults are mentioned alongside other forbidden items.

entities.name: Fanged Frisbees
entities.description: Fanged Frisbees are mentioned as still having enough life in them to hover half-heartedly over the mountains of other forbidden items.

entities.name: congealed potions
entities.description: Chipped bottles of congealed potions are mentioned.

entities.name: hats
entities.description: Hats are mentioned alongside other items.

entities.name: jewels
entities.description: Jewels are mentioned in the text.

entities.name: cl oaks
entities.description: Cl oaks are mentioned as forbidden items.

entities.name: dragon-egg shells
entities.description: Dragon-egg shells are mentioned in the text.

entities.name: corked bottles
entities.description: Corked bottles whose contents still shimmered evilly are mentioned.

entities.name: axe
entities.description: A heavy, blood-stained axe is mentioned in the text.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character, Harry, is mentioned as hurrying forwards into one of the many alleyways between all this hidden treasure.

entities.name: troll
entities.description: An enormous stuffed troll is mentioned in the text.

entities.name: Vanishing Cabinet
entities.description: A broken Vanishing Cabinet is mentioned as being used by Montague the previous year.

entities.name: Montague
entities.description: Montague is mentioned as getting lost in the Vanishing Cabinet the previous year.

entities.name: cupboard
entities.description: A large cupboard with a blistered surface is mentioned.

relationships.description: Harry passed by the enormous stuffed troll.
Harry ran past a broken Vanishing Cabinet.
Harry finally paused beside a large cupboard which seemed to have had acid thrown at its blistered surface.
He opened one of the cupboardâ€™s creaking doors.
